alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 3:40PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf and southeastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, Gadsden, Liberty and northwestern Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 445 PM EST/345 PM CST/... At 340 PM EST/240 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chattahoochee to near Mexico Beach. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Port St. Joe, Blountstown, Havana, Mexico Beach, Greensboro, Stonemill Creek, Chattahoochee, Orange, Wewahitchka, Gretna, Bristol, Rock Bluff, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Juniper, Douglas City, Vilas, Florence and Chipola Cutoff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
